text:
*Does the idea of a framework like Bootstrap or Foundation - built from the ground up to use and push HubSpot’s advanced capabilities to their limits, sound like something you want?*
Join <#CCQSQ2C6L|crankshaft> where we’re working on exactly that. It’s a HubL party, and you’re invited. :tada:
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft>
